content: mats etc single puffs can be used for make-up removers / facial scrubbies or even cat toys you are limited only by your imagination you can use various ways to join the puffs single_crochet them together mattress stitch or even just use scrap yarn and tie them together at each corner this pattern was inspired by the beekeeper s quilt by stephanie dosen feel free to use this pattern for non-commercial use friends family swaps
